org.apache.juneau

Class CoreApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Lockable
      • org.apache.juneau.CoreApi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Parser, RestClient, Serializer, VarResolver

    public abstract class CoreApi
extends Lockable
    Common super class for all core-API serializers, parsers, and serializer/parser groups.
    Description

    Maintains an inner ContextFactory instance that can be used by serializer and parser subclasses to work with beans in a consistent way.

    Provides several duplicate convenience methods from the ContextFactory class to set properties on that class from this class.

    Also implements the Lockable interface to allow for easy locking and cloning.

    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getContextFactory

        public ContextFactory getContextFactory()
        Returns the ContextFactory object associated with this class.

        The context factory stores all configuration properties for this class. Adding/modifying properties on this factory will alter the behavior of this object.

        Calling the Lockable.lock() method on the returned object will prevent any further modifications to the configuration for this object ANY ANY OTHERS THAT SHARE THE SAME FACTORY!. Note that calling the lock() method on this class will only lock the configuration for this particular instance of the class.

        Returns:
        The context factory associated with this object.

        Returns the bean context to use for this class.

      • checkLock

        public void checkLock()
        Description copied from class: Lockable
        Causes a LockedException to be thrown if this object has been locked.

        Also calls Lockable.onUnclone() if this is the first time this method has been called since cloning.

        Overrides:
